refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the MIDI channel number from which the note was activated.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: midichn returns the MIDI channel number (1 - 16) from which the note was activated. In the case of score notes, it returns 0.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ichn -- channel number. If the current note was activated from score, it is set to zero.
